name: Jungle Warfare
overview:
Jungle Warfare is a rail shooter. The object is to traverse the enemy jungle territory, fending off hostile fire and destroying a series of enemy bases, to reach safe ground. You must shoot your enemies quickly enough or they will fire back and you will lose one of your three lives. You must also collect ammo along the way by shooting it or you will soon run out.

Game supports a light gun, but is also playable with joystick and/or keyboard.
